value:
This castle's nice and solid. They put
me in charge of defending our castle,
so you can trust me—I know castles!

Things in my world... Not so good
right now. I just stick with Lord Sigurd.
I'll serve him up until the very end.

I just want to get married, have kids,
and work hard for my family.
Someday...

You wanna try on my armor? That's
funny. You wouldn't even be able to
stand up!

If you need protection, I'm your man.$k$pBut do me a favor and call as soon as
you can, OK? It's going to take me a
while to get there.

Arden here! I guess you must be
$Nu.$k$pI got a message for ya from your pal
$Nf.

I'm strong, I'm tough...and I ain't
slow!

Feels like my armor got a little bit
lighter!

There's a huge weight on my
shoulders. I can feel it.

I better look after myself, with you
expecting so much from me!

My name is Arden! I'm one of Lord
Sigurd of Chalphy's men. Good to
meet you!

Why is everybody always leaving me
behind? I swear...$k$pNo, I get it. My armor's heavy. It
makes me slow, and I can't keep up
with 'em.$k$pThe thing is, that's my job! I'm an
armored knight. Take away this thick
armor, and I couldn't protect anybody!$k$pThere's no way I'm gonna stop doing
my job, so I've made myself square
with it.$k$pListen to me grumble! I guess you just
did, now that I mention it. Hey, I feel a
lot better now. Thanks!
ふんっ！
おりゃっ！
うああっ！
This ain't good...
I'm strong, and you're toast.
I'm strong and I'm tough!
Nnn...ngh!
Ain't no way I'm gonna die!
I lived like I wanted...
Ahaha!
Hey! Don't forget to put me on the front line!
Huh? You want to try on my armor? You pulling my leg?
Strong and tough is good. I like that. But I'm beggin' ya... Don't call me slow.
Phew! So damn tired. This is some heavy armor.
If I was a little bit quicker, I might have more luck with the ladies.
It's a cryin' shame. I'm strong and I'm tough, but...
I like fighting with you! I do a lot better than I normally would.
I'm beat!
My turn?
Full power!
